channel.title: 路透财经
channel.description: 这是一个追踪路透财经news的种子

item.title: 鲜为人知的印度选举债券买家？Qwik 供应链隶属于大亨穆克什-安巴尼（Mukesh Ambani）的信实公司（Reliance） 监管文件显示，三家信实公司（办公地址与信实公司其他业务相同）是 Qwik 的股东。 🧵
item.description:
A little-known India electoral bonds' buyer?

Qwik Supply Chain

It's affiliated to tycoon Mukesh Ambani's Reliance

Regulatory filings show three Reliance firms - with same office addresses as other Reliance businesses - are Qwik shareholders. https://t.co/8nEMH5BTAo 🧵

— Aditya Kalra (@adityakalra) March 15, 2024

item.title: 日产和本田正考虑建立战略合作伙伴关系，合作生产电动汽车和汽车软件平台人工智能的关键零部件
item.description:
Nissan and Honda are considering a strategic partnership to collaborate on producing key components for EVs and AI in automotive software platformshttps://t.co/47LW27eW7L pic.twitter.com/OM4kRXN3hX

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 15, 2024

item.title: 比特币在震荡交易中跌至一周低点，原因是投资者从比特币创下的历史新高中获利了结，而且美国通胀再次出现上行意外，使得美国提前降息的前景暗淡，并削弱了对高风险资产的需求。
item.description:
Bitcoin eased to a one-week low in volatile trade, as investors took profit from its run to a record high and as another upside surprise on US inflation dimmed prospects of early rate cuts there and dented demand for riskier assets https://t.co/XBxDpNpRkF

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 15, 2024

item.title: 中国的计算机驱动 "量化 "对冲基金正在加强风险管理，重新调整投资组合，以符合国家对公平竞争的定义，因为监管机构正在打击这个规模达 2,600 亿美元的行业，以重振散户投资者的信心。
item.description:
China's computer-driven ‘quant’ hedge funds are beefing up risk management and retooling their portfolios to conform to the state's definitions of fair play, as regulators clamp down on the $260 billion sector to revive retail investor confidence https://t.co/DqNqByY1BF

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 15, 2024

item.title: 美国股市下跌，原因是生产者价格跳涨，让投资者怀疑美联储降息的等待时间是否会比预期的更长，而芯片制造商股票连续第二天扩大跌幅：
item.description:
US stocks dropped as a jump in producer prices left investors wondering if the Federal Reserve might wait longer than expected to cut interest rates, while chipmaker stocks extended losses for a second day.
Read more: https://t.co/VJV7rhW8pw pic.twitter.com/OTYGI3tuF0

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 15, 2024

item.title: 中国央行维持关键政策利率不变，同时从中期政策性贷款操作中提取现金，在美联储降息预期时间不确定的情况下，中国政府继续将货币稳定放在首位
item.description:
China's central bank left a key policy rate unchanged while withdrawing cash from a medium-term policy loan operation as authorities continued to prioritize currency stability amid uncertainty over the timing of expected Federal Reserve interest rate cuts https://t.co/gKsIb0v1fY

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 15, 2024

item.title: 观看：据媒体报道，本田和日产可能将联手合作，而《日经商业日报》称两家公司可能会在电动汽车领域展开合作
item.description:
WATCH: Honda and Nissan could be set to join forces, according to media reports, while the Nikkei business daily said they could collaborate on electric vehicles https://t.co/sryHcrP6gK pic.twitter.com/cAeh76QEFT

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 15, 2024

item.title: 来自 @Breakingviews：随着 TikTok 日益强大，美国众议院通过的立法将迫使中国字节跳动公司出售社交媒体应用程序，否则将面临禁令。@jennifersaba 解释了为什么最新的解决方案只是自 2020 年以来困扰华盛顿的同样问题的一个小转折。
item.description:
From @Breakingviews: As TikTok grows more powerful, the legislation passed in the US House will force China’s ByteDance to sell social-media app or face a ban. @jennifersaba explains why the latest solution is just a slight twist on the same problems vexing Washington since 2020 pic.twitter.com/wd8p5Jc6pm

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 15, 2024

item.title: 在美国众议院以压倒性多数通过一项法案，要求 TikTok 的中国所有者字节跳动在六个月内剥离该短视频应用程序在美国的资产，否则将面临禁令之后，内容创作者劳伦和西斯-威利斯表示他们并不担心。
item.description:
Content creators Lauren and Si Willis say they aren't worried after the US House of Representatives overwhelmingly passed a bill that would give TikTok's Chinese owner ByteDance about six months to divest the US assets of the short-video app or face a ban https://t.co/HAbrmgNXE0 pic.twitter.com/Kr0LTGme14

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 15, 2024

item.title: 美国股市下跌，原因是生产者价格的跳涨让投资者怀疑美联储是否会比预期更晚才降息。市场已将美联储6月降息的概率从一周前的超过80%降至约63%：
item.description:
US stocks dropped as a jump in producer prices left investors wondering if the Fed might wait longer than expected to cut interest rates. The market has trimmed the odds of a rate cut in June to about 63%, down from over 80% just a week ago.
Read more: https://t.co/VJV7rhW8pw pic.twitter.com/WNOGrpqgzY

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 15, 2024

item.description:
BNP Paribas considers buying Fosun's Ageas stake, Bloomberg News reports https://t.co/kgU6cAbgze pic.twitter.com/OFqyArizlz

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 15, 2024

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 15, 2024

item.title: 来自 @Breakingviews：美国众议院通过的立法将迫使中国字节跳动公司出售社交媒体应用程序，否则将面临禁令。最新的解决方案是自 2020 年以来困扰华盛顿的同样问题的一个小转折，@jennifersaba 解释道
item.description:
From @Breakingviews: Legislation passed in the US House would force China’s ByteDance to sell the social-media app or face a ban. The latest solution is a slight twist on the same problems vexing Washington since 2020, @jennifersaba explains pic.twitter.com/WI3gVKdm1Q

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 14, 2024
